programme.title: Holla
programme.desc: A mysterious killer stalks a sitcom actress and her companions on a weekend getaway in the wilderness.

programme.title: Holla II
programme.desc: Years after an attack by her ill sister, a woman’s wedding party faces deaths at a haunted plantation house.

programme.title: Rosemary's Baby
programme.desc: When Rosemary and Guy head to Paris, they realize their new apartment has a haunted past.

programme.title: Rosemary's Baby
programme.desc: As Guy finds success, Rosemary's health declines during the course of her pregnancy.

programme.title: Everyday Black Man
programme.desc: A father’s past resurfaces, forcing him to protect his daughter and community in this intense family drama.

programme.title: Good Fences
programme.desc: Whoopi Goldberg and Danny Glover star as a couple adjusting to their new life after moving to Connecticut.

programme.title: Breakin' 2: Electric Boogaloo
programme.desc: A developer tries to bulldoze a community recreation center and local breakdancers try to stop it.

programme.title: Holiday Heart
programme.desc: Ving Rhames plays a drag queen who cares for a drug addict (Alfre Woodard) and helps raise her daughter.

programme.title: Grandma's House
programme.desc: A teenager and her step brothers are forced to move in with their strict grandmother.

programme.title: Mama Flora's Family
programme.desc: Cicely Tyson stars as a grandmother reuniting her family as she reflects on her life from the 1910s to 1970s.

programme.title: Mama Flora's Family
programme.desc: Cicely Tyson stars as a grandmother reuniting her family as she reflects on her life from the 1910s to 1970s.

programme.title: The Women of Brewster Place
programme.desc: A multigenerational story of the lives of several black women who call an inner-city tenement home.

programme.title: Cooley High
programme.desc: Chicago, 1964: Two teens navigate the end of high school in this authentic portrait of Black youth.
